document_data.name: House Nurbonnis
document_data.mainbody: '''House Nurbonnis''' was a noble [[drow]] house of [[Menzoberranzan]]. They were the 21{{st}}-ranked house around [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Notable Members:
* Matron Mother: [[Nadallas Bonnine]]
* Firstborn Son: [[Pernictal Nurbonnis]]
* Second Son: [[Daevion'lyr Nurbonnis]]
* [[Adlictin Nurbonnis]]
* [[Caraf'nir Pron'nonnis]]
* [[Carri'pol Nurbonnis]]
* [[Karelist Nurbonnis]]
* [[Lynn'qynnos Nurbonnis]]
* [[Rynn'qynnil Nurbonnis]]
